desc: Rustic furniture and home décor handmade from select Adirondack hardwoods. Traditional joinery with rustic elements (live edges; stump and root pedestals; twig, stick, burl highlights). Some Shaker and timber-frame designs. Unique pieces professionally handcrafted for camp, cabin or lodge. Adirondack furnishings decor.

layout.text:
Fine traditional woodworking with a rustic flair
Morrisonville, NY
